p: Though ZIKV infection might be asymptomatic or shows mild clinical symptoms, it can be fatal for newborn babies. Adults may also suffer from many neurological disorders due to ZILV infection. On the other hand, ZIKV infection has been reported in almost all the neighboring countries including Bangladesh. Bangladesh is at high risk for emerging threat for ZIKV infection and currently, there is no active surveillance system on it. Therefore, it can be taken into consideration that the recommended actions and strategies illustrated in this short review for the prevention and control of the ZIKV infection in Bangladesh, particularly by establishing national ZIKV surveillance, increase public awareness and mosquito control.
